text: Euspondylus guentheri, Günther's sun tegus, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Ecuador. ==References== Category:Euspondylus Category:Reptiles of Ecuador Category:Endemic fauna of Ecuador Category:Reptiles described in 1881 Category:Taxa named by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
title: Euspondylus guentheri
